footer.cite: If someone has good shares, they would be crazy to sell just because of a price setback. I look for companies that I understand and whose future prospects I am convinced of.

calculator.disclaimer: All calculations on this page are made without guarantee and no guarantee can or will be given for the accuracy of the results.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.content:
The dividend calculator is purely a fun project without any commercial interest. Initially, I simply wanted to realize my idea of a dividend calculator. Then, especially via Twitter/X many great ideas flowed in.

So today I would say that this is already a small community project and I'm excited to see what time will bring.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: E-mail address to come, but until then I can be reached via Twitter/X in any case:

sourcecode.title: Source Code
sourcecode.content: If you are interested, you can view the source code for the project here:

news.release-1.0.0:
The preview phase has been completed and release 1.0.0 is now online.

Most of the features of the “old” AktienTraum calculator have been implemented, although the calculation approach has already been changed to some extent. The purchase of shares is now simulated in the background. This leads to lower results compared to the previous dividend calculator, but these should be much more realistic.

I still have a lot of ideas buzzing around in my head, so further versions should not be long in coming.
news.release-1.0.1:
FinTwit went straight into the test and noticed that the dividend is shown gross in the first year.

In principle, not much can be said about the current year, especially as this shows the sum of all previous years invested. This row in the results table is therefore is now highlighted in color and most of the values are not displayed.

This adjustment does not change the results of the calculation over time.
news.release-2.0.0:
The dividend calculator now supports different language variants. This is already a big step and therefore also the bigger version jump.

We'll start with the English version and thanks to DeepL other language variants are now mainly a labor of love.

documentation.disclaimer:
Compared to the “old” dividend calculator, which was still part of the AktienTraum blog (which no longer exists ;-)), there have been some fundamental changes in the calculation.

With the old calculator, the dividend yield was the leading factor. Over time, however, this became too large, as the dampening effect of price increases on the dividend yield was not taken into account.

To avoid this problem, the new dividend calculator simulates the purchase of shares in the background. The dividend is then calculated on these shares and this dividend - together with the share price - leads to the dividend yield.

Also, net values are now always used in the calculations, unless you enter zero for the interest rate. Only then is the capital available for share purchases from dividends realistic.

More details on the calculation are gradually being documented here and can of course also be found in the source code.

imprint.preface:
This is a purely private site without any commercial interest and therefore does not require an imprint.
  Nevertheless, I would like to provide some basic information here.
imprint.content-1:
No liability is assumed for the correctness or completeness of the calculations performed here. All results may be incorrect and it is up to the user to check them. No decisions may be made based on the be made based on the results of this dividend calculator. This is purely a fun project

Obligations to remove or block the use of information in accordance with the general laws remain remain unaffected by this. However, liability in this respect is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. As soon as I become aware of any such legal infringements, I will remove this content immediately.

The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking.

However, permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. infringement is not reasonable. If I become aware of any legal infringements, I will remove such links immediately.
imprint.content-3:

privacy.content: No personal data is processed or stored on this website.
